html:
4.2.18  8:22 pm   Is shame productive in certain contexts?

     maybe but i can't think of any

4.2.18  8:19 pm   do you like any of Taylor Swift's songs ?

     yes

4.2.18  8:13 pm   how many words are in the title in your new song?

     there are possible variations, ranging from 3 to 5, i have not made a final decision yet, but i am leaning toward 5

4.2.18  8:06 pm   When did what happen

     always

4.2.18  8:04 pm   Do you think your answer to a music-related question would depend on your mood at the time you saw the question?

     it depends more on the question

4.2.18  7:55 pm   Is there a way to appreciate hostility?

     yes

4.2.18  7:15 pm   do you like verbs?

     some of them

4.2.18  7:13 pm   If I have no passions how do i discover them, or do they not exist at all

     explore a bit

4.2.18  6:47 pm   Will u help me reshape my nose 

     no

4.2.18  6:45 pm   You're pretty forgiving about grammar as long as you can tell what a question is saying. Are you like that for music questions as well?

     of course

     There are things I'd like to ask, but I'm not super literate in music theory so I've been holding back.

     you may be surprised at who knows what

4.2.18  6:44 pm   What's your new song called? 

     i can't tell you

4.2.18  5:50 pm   is it possible to turn really dark and cryptic words into a happy and cheerful song that only reveals its dark underside when you look between the lines?

     you will have to try it and see

4.2.18  5:38 pm   are you aware that the amazon alexa thinks your name is spelled bill wertz?

     ah, that explains why alexa doesn't find my music

      it makes it IMPOSSIBLE to ask her to play your music on spotify. filed a complained just a few minutes ago, yw big guy

4.2.18  5:06 pm   4.1.18  12:06 am Capitals!!! 

     very good job

4.2.18  5:04 pm   percentage of video completion?

     oh nice try

4.2.18  4:39 pm   do you know what life is

     i have some guesses

4.2.18  4:30 pm   what label do you fall under

     person

4.2.18  4:02 pm   4.1.18  10:02 pm he didn't actually touch any boys (not sexually that is), and I'd appreciate you not spreading that falsehood any longer, thanks.

     are you sure i said what you said i said

4.2.18  3:45 pm   did you do the harmonising the weather lady by hand?

     i used my hands and also a piano keyboard and an audio memo recording device but if you are wondering if i came up with all the notes and chords myself the answer is yes

     Would you be interested in a tool that does that?

     i think you are misunderstanding what is happening there

4.2.18  3:36 pm   when you start working on a project, do you set a estimated date for it's completion?

     sometimes a prayerful target

      For example, when you starting making HOTEWIG,

     that is kind of an exception because it is the longest, most work-intensive, and most ambitious project i have ever attempted

     did you have a goal for when you would finish it?

     i already knew history of japan took over 3 months, which was unacceptable. more than a week for any project is unacceptable. but all i can do is work as fast as possible

     I know you say you don't know when the new video will be done, but surely you can estimate at least the month it will be done?

     even if i had an estimate, i have learned not to say because it causes pandemonium on the questions page. i keep getting tricked into doing it and i think by now i have finally learned my lesson

4.2.18  3:33 pm   will you ever make an Announcements page on this website? Like, so people can find out about the stuff you are working on without it having to be asked on the questions page?

     it seems like that would ruin the announcement and the website at the same time

4.2.18  3:29 pm   4.1.18  11:42 pm I think he meant "Is it your main source of income?"

     enough about me, tell me about your income

4.2.18  3:14 pm   hey bill how do you make a composition like you did in "a Play featuring an iphone power block and a mechanical pencil" it feels like the inanimate object are talking

     it's loosely improvised, line by line, just by looking at the screen and playing along. then layering as needed

4.2.18  3:04 pm   which questions are your least favorite to answer?

     the ones that ask me to dislike something

4.2.18  2:12 pm   Do you think that the bad in life could ever outweigh the good?

     i see it as more of a blender, than a scale

4.2.18  2:04 pm   hey man you like motifs? you like getting *thematic*?

     i think there is a danger here of enjoying the words 'motif' and 'theme' at the expense of the actual content

4.2.18  1:50 pm   If Bob is Jim and Jim is Bob, who is Bob?

     jim and bob

4.2.18  1:33 pm   waitttttttt i haven't been on this site for !ages! and it seems like you have changed some stuff noooooooo change it back to the old classic style!!!!!

     this is the old classic style. i did not change the style

4.2.18  12:55 pm   Is it possible to tell if something is a capital O, a lower-case o, or a zero (0) without any other letters around it for reference? 

     some fonts have a slash thru the zero, most fonts have the zero taller and thinner, most fonts have the lowercase o perfectly round, the shape of the capital O is usually slightly wider than the zero and sometimes slightly taller than lowercase o, but without any reference it might be impossible to know for sure unless there is a slash

4.2.18  12:49 pm   Very often, I'll get ideas at the most random times,

     me too

     but I have a hard time just sitting down and trying to force a song out of thin air. I kind of have to have something, even if it's just a few bars, to work off of.

     i know what you mean

     Do you ever sit down and try to write a song from scratch.. as in, just sitting at the piano with nothing in mind (apart from the improv page, I guess)?

     yes. it can be done

     Or do you usually wait for a melody idea or something to come to you (wherever and whenever that may be), and then start writing off of that idea? 

     i am very diligent about capturing ideas whenever they fall on me, because this is just how ideas tend to occur. so a large amount of starting points from songs actually come from those ideas that fall on me at an unexpected time and place. it is very important to meticulously catch all these ideas as they fall on you. generating ideas from a blank desk can be done but it is only part of the picture

4.2.18  12:14 pm   Answer some questions 

     i almost didn't even think of that

4.2.18  11:54 am   i made something and it sound really strong but it doesnt sound right because i suck at mixing and the correct way to approach this problem would be to get better at mixing but i want so much music to make and i actually want to listen my shit and trying and trying and trying different things with equalizers doesnt feel like making music but like polishing it, but also i am obsessed with my work to be mine so i cant just let someone else mix it for money etc. so all i can do is try one thing at a time by song and just have it without trying something else and try something else at the other song but that way i feel like the good stuff will come sooo much later then i expected and i want my things to sound good so H E L P M E 

     start out by making sure everything is at the right volume compared to each other

4.2.18  10:45 am   ive been playing classical and jazz trumpet for years and it has always been the only thing that my family and people like that recognize me as. ive gotten the same book of sheet music for every gift giving holiday the past 3 years. Im realizing now that it really doesnt make me happy, it actually makes me really really stressed. I dont want to stop playing because there are some good people in the same program as me and it is the only thing that i do. I leave school at 5 everyday and have 3 rehearsals a day. i dont think im great with rhythms, no matter how easy they are i mess up. i dread going to rehearsal everyday and i dont know what to do. i thought this is what i wanted to do with my life but now i dont want to look at sheet music ever again, i feel trapped. i cant talk to my family about this

     yes you can

      and my friend doesnt care about music and doesnt understand, what would you do if you were in this situation?

     i don't know but you should probably put it to the side and find some things you are more interested in

4.2.18  10:22 am   what is architecture

     buildings, and more

4.2.18  9:48 am    i have all these fragmented ideas and i love them all im just trying to record them but its kinda hard sometimes. sometimes your imagination falls apart, sometimes its just hard to put them into words. and other times theyre so crazy that you wanna make them work but its difficult to be comfortable with your crazy ideas. its crazy and its a challenge but i feel like if i find a way to be comfortable with my ideas and do what i want with them, ill unlock something. im just trying to find a way to express them in the best form. does that make sense? 

     yes

4.2.18  6:59 am   Is cardboard fun?

     with the right attitude, yes

4.2.18  5:48 am   Why do you usually never use capitals in your videos/website? 

     my capitalization usage is similar to a vast percentage of people living in the world today. taking a glance at some of the purple text on this page should garner some example as to that

4.2.18  4:52 am   help i accidentally sent a message to the wrong person what do i do what if they reply please help

     that depends on what their reply is

4.2.18  3:16 am   What language do you enjoy not understanding?

     none

4.2.18  1:45 am   how many percent your work progress in making new video?

     i don't quite have a way to calculate that, and giving estimations causes pandemonium on the questions page and i have learned my lesson

4.2.18  1:44 am   is making this things(music and video) is your work or just a hobby in free time?

     i do it all day every day, i don't know if that counts

4.2.18  1:40 am   ever think about make a teamwork to make some videos or music?

     yes but i can't seem to let go of the huge advantages of doing everything myself

4.2.18  12:20 am   what is your favourite part of your video/song creation process?

     releasing it

4.1.18  11:53 pm   Is it true that you make up all the questions yourself and then ask them to people and then write down their answers as your own?

     no

     Because that would be a pretty cool idea for a question that I would ask about if you make up all the questions yourself and then ask them to people and then write down their answers as your own.

4.1.18  11:42 pm   do you do videos n music n art as a job

     i work on it all day every day, i don't know if that counts

4.1.18  11:38 pm   do you microwave your videos before posting them

     no but i convert them to mp4, which is a similar process

4.1.18  11:02 pm   How did you learn all those neat chords?

     hearing them, trying them, making some up, etc.

4.1.18  10:58 pm   have you ever rode in a taxi?

     it's more fun to ride on the roof

4.1.18  10:57 pm   are you combining april 2018 and march 2018 into one page? it looks like you are

     no but they are both on the current page. they will be archived by month as always

4.1.18  10:02 pm   do you ever laugh because i don't see that often

     now that i think about it i can't recall seeing you laugh
